Lebowski.Net.IConnection

Lebowski.Net.IConnection Interface Reference

Provides functionality for bi-directional communication with another host. Outgoing communication is performed with Send, whereas to react to incoming messages, the client has to subscribe to the Received event. More...

EventHandler< ReceivedEventArgs > Received
 Occurs when a packet is received from the endpoint.

Detailed Description

Provides functionality for bi-directional communication with another host. Outgoing communication is performed with Send, whereas to react to incoming messages, the client has to subscribe to the Received event.
